content.question: Which of the following statements best conveys the effect of the sentences “The broad unwieldy carriages . . . twenty or thirty paces” near the end of the second paragraph?

choices.label: The imagery reinforces a sense of the vulnerability of the pedestrians.
The candid tone removes blame from the owners of the houses.
The exaggerated diction undercuts the danger mentioned in the previous sentence.
The parallel structure emphasizes the unity among the townspeople.

content.answer: The imagery reinforces a sense of the vulnerability of the pedestrians.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
